vulnerabilities.description: ** DISPUTED ** Improper parsing of HTTP requests in Pallets Werkzeug v2.1.0 and below allows attackers to perform HTTP Request Smuggling using a crafted HTTP request with multiple requests included inside the body. NOTE: the vendor's position is that this behavior can only occur in unsupported configurations involving development mode and an HTTP server from outside the Werkzeug project.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Monitor Werkzeug for security updates and apply them when available.
vulnerabilities.title: PYSEC-2022-203
